subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former Bucks power forward Kevin Restani died in San Francisco after returning from Milwaukee, where he had attended Game 3 between the Bucks and the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday night.
snippet: The former Bucks power forward Kevin Restani died in San Francisco after returning from Milwaukee, where he had attended Game 3 between the Bucks and the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday night.
